name: SOUNDBOKS
headline: We're creating the loudest battery-driven speaker on the market
description:
SOUNDBOKS is a Copenhagen-based, Y Combinator backed, hardware start-up developing and selling the world's loudest battery powered speaker.

SOUNDBOKS was founded in 2015 by three young Danes who shared the same love and passion for music, amazing parties and festivals. Today, SOUNDBOKS is Scandinavia's fastest growing hardware start-up delivering speakers to happy customers all over Europe & North America. In March 2016, SOUNDBOKS launched the most succesful Danish Kickstarter Campaign of all time!

We are a young, ambitious team ready to take on the challenge of becoming the number 1 brand for outdoor audio and provide world-class service to our customers.

JOIN THE PARTY, JOIN SOUNDBOKS.

founders.name: Jesper Theil Thomsen, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
I'm the CEO & co-founder of SOUNDBOKS. 

I'm based in Copenhagen.

##  CONTROL EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE 
Whether you're throwing the biggest party of the year or chilling with your friends, tune your SOUNDBOKS to the occasion with our app. Find out more [**here.**](http://soundboks.com/</pages/app> "SOUNDBOKS App")
[ ![](http://soundboks.com/cdn/shop/files/Get-in-on-Playstore.png?v=1726483871&width=150) ](http://soundboks.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.soundboks.SOUNDBOKS>) [ ![](http://soundboks.com/cdn/shop/files/Get-in-on-App-Store.png?v=1726483871&width=150) ](http://soundboks.com/<https:/apps.apple.com/us/app/soundboks/id1440156667>)

## Don't take our word for it
![](http://soundboks.com/cdn/shop/files/Large-Stefan_Wessel_Soundbox_ROS18_9.png?v=1729089527&width=2880)
Our story
## Take A Trip Down Memory Lane
A spilled pilsner killed the first speaker we made after 20 minutes. Despite that, we still managed to do what we do best: bring people together to party and make really cool memories.
[Read More](http://soundboks.com/</pages/our-story>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: SOUNDBOKS**

Founded in 2015 by three passionate Danes, SOUNDBOKS has quickly risen to prominence as one of Scandinavia’s fastest-growing hardware startups. Based in Copenhagen and backed by Y Combinator (Batch W16), the company specializes in creating the loudest battery-powered speakers on the market, aimed at music lovers, party enthusiasts, and festival-goers everywhere.

**Mission Statement:**
SOUNDBOKS is on a mission to design the loudest battery-driven speakers available, ensuring that every gathering is amplified with high-quality sound.

**Key Accomplishments:**
- Launched in March 2016, the company executed the most successful Danish Kickstarter campaign of all time, highlighting robust initial interest and support for their innovative product.
- SOUNDBOKS currently employs a dynamic team of around 50 individuals, all driven to establish the brand as the top choice for outdoor audio solutions, while ensuring world-class service for their customers.

**Products:**
The flagship products, including the SOUNDBOKS 4 and SOUNDBOKS GO, offer impressive sound quality, portability, and durability, catering to various user needs—whether it's a backyard gathering or a large outdoor festival. The brand emphasizes that while other speakers might fail to deliver in volume and quality, SOUNDBOKS aims to exceed expectations.

**Community Engagement:**
SOUNDBOKS actively engages with its community on multiple platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok. They invite music enthusiasts to "JOIN THE PARTY, JOIN SOUNDBOKS"—a call that resonates not just with their customers, but with anyone who values memorable shared experiences.

**E-Commerce and Shipping:**
Their website (http://soundboks.com) offers a user-friendly shopping experience with standard shipping on orders over $40, aiming to make great sound accessible across North America and Europe.

**Conclusion:**
As SOUNDBOKS continues to innovate and expand, they remain committed to their roots—bringing people together through the universal love of music. Whether you’re at home, at a party, or on the go, they’re here to ensure the sound is just right. To put it simply, SOUNDBOKS believes that nothing beats turning up to 11.
